What is HTML?

ğŸŒ

HyperText Markup Language

HTML is the backbone of every website on the internet. It's a markup language that defines the structure and
content of web pages. Every website you visit â€“ from Google to Instagram, from e-commerce stores to online,
banking portals â€“ is built upon HTML.
At TAP Academy, we believe in learning by doing. Under the guidance of Trainer Harshit Sir, you'll not only
understand HTML concepts but also apply them through hands-on projects.

âœ“ Semantic Elements âœ“ Forms & Inputs âœ“ Tables & Lists âœ“ Multimedia

Importance of HTML in Real World

ğŸ’¼
Gateway to Web Development

HTML is the first step in every web
developer's journey. Whether you
want to become a front-end
developer, full-stack engineer, or UX
designer â€“ HTML knowledge is
essential. 		ğŸŒ
Universal Language of Web

Every browser in the world
understands HTML. From Chrome to
Safari, Firefox to Edge â€“ HTML is the
universal standard reaching billions
of users. 		ğŸ“±
Mobile App Development

Hybrid mobile apps utilize HTML
principles. Understanding HTML
opens doors to cross-platform
mobile development with
frameworks
ğŸ”
SEO & Accessibility

Proper HTML structure helps search
engines understand your content.
Semantic HTML makes websites
accessible to people with disabilities. 		ğŸ“§
Email Marketing

Beautiful marketing emails from
Apple, Amazon, Netflix are built using
HTML. Email template development
is a specialized, in-demand skill. 		ğŸ’°
High-Paying Career

LPA on average. Starting with HTML
